content: the maisie blanket is a spin on a classic granny square blanket it uses half double crochets and only a few chain spaces to create a tighter less hole-y blanket while this blanket alternates between 2 colours you don t have to worry about weaving in a million ends there is an easy colour changing technique included to make this project fun and relaxing lastly a pom-pom border is added for a touch of playfulness and texture this is a relaxing and meditative project that you can crochet as you watch tv > the free pattern for the lapghan size 47 x 47 can be found **here ** 1 > buy 2 patterns get 1 free with coupon code freepattern add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code discount will be applied at checkout skill level easy / advanced beginner language english crochet terminology us terms video tutorials yes video tutorials are included for the pom-pom border and rnds 1 - 4 * the pdf includes instructions for 9 blanket sizes small baby 36 x 36 large baby 40 x 40 custom 47 x 47 lapghan 50 x 50 small throw 60 x 60 medium throw 70 x 70 large throw 80 x 80 queen 90 x 90 and king 102 x 102 * the pattern includes an easy colour changing technique to help you minimize the number of ends you ll need to weave in * the printable pdf is a total of 13 pages and includes step-by-step pictures and video tutorials > other details * 6 0mm crochet hook needed * medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design * yarn used lion brand heartland in the colours grand canyon and badlands * pattern has been tech edited 1 https //thispixiecreates com/how-to-crochet-a-two-stripe-granny-square-blanket/
